articles.author: Shubhangi Dua
articles.title: 40-year research finds carbon nitrides tougher than diamonds - Interesting Engineering
articles.description: Carbon nitrides exhibit remarkable heat resistance and encompass the essential components required for achieving super-hardness, experts said.
articles.content:
Diamond anvil cell conditions include high temperatures and pressures, chemical vapor deposition, laser heating, or hydrothermal/solvothermal methods.
